Document.Title: ASP, VBScript and ADSI: ADSI Authentication Function; basADSILogin

Content:
Function basADSILogin(vDomain,vUser,vPwd)
    Dim vADsPath
    vADsPath = "WinNT://" & vDomain & "/" & vUser & ",user"

    Dim objADSI

    basADSILogin = False

    On Error Resume Next
    Set objADSI = GetObject(vADsPath)
    If Err.number <> 0 Then Exit Function

    Dim objADSINamespace : Set objADSINamespace = GetObject("WinNT:")

    On Error Resume Next
    Set objADSI = objADSINamespace.OpenDSObject(vADsPath,vUser,vPwd,0)
    If Err.number = 0 Then
        basADSILogin = True
    End If

    Set objADSI = Nothing
    Set objADSINamespace = Nothing
End Function
